Green, healing, history, dear city Bursa! I salute you heartily.
We are all Turkey witness together with Bursa, we are unemployed from our national service, there is no objection from Hakka case.
Bursa is my 7th city I visited as President. After that, I hope that our visits to the provinces will continue.
Some people want to be uncomfortable, that the President should sit in Ankara, sign only the documents that come in front of him, and do not engage in any other business.
They say the President has landed in the squares. The point is that it's not in the square. My place is nationality, they are in the wrong place.
We do not bring the presidential system to the pleasure, to make ourselves pay for it.
Those who have reduced the presidential system to my personalities, those who argue only on me, do not look up, they look at the world with eyeglasses.
For Turkey, for our nationality, for our future, I want the presidential system, I fight for it.

The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of the president during the commemorative act # PT35Anos, in Belo Horizonte (MG).
The act is being broadcast live on http://t.co/b7yINF93Q9 # PT35Ans
The PT reaches 35 years. It is a young party, but it starts the fourth warrant to the front of the federal government. # PT35You
After 12 years of social inclusion and development policies, Brazil is a much better country today. # PT35You
Our responsibility is great, because the Brazilians expect us to honor the continuity of what we have done (...) # PT35
(...) but also to deepen the transformations and expand democracy. Us
The history of the PT is an identification roadmap with the Brazilian people. From the beginning it had a deep connection with the mov. social policies. Us
I made it clear during the campaign that the main objective would be to prepare Brazil for a new stage of development. Us
Step q is our path to a new era, the era of knowledge, with absolute priority for investments in education. Us
Transforming Brazil into an educating country means opening up this history of the future so that the country ceases to be an emerging nation. Us
Only together can we make a government with continuity and at the same time of changes. Us
The adjustments we are making are necessary, not only to keep the course, but to widen the opportunity (...)
(...) and has the strength to preserve the social and economic priorities of the PT governments at the federal level. Us
We want to ensure the continuity of employment and income generation. # PT35anservers http://t.co/VukEnwIVo8
We do not rebalance just for doing, but because we want to guarantee jobs and income. Us
We will promote fiscal balance gradually, without compromising income and employment. Us
We have the lowest unemployment rates in our history and we want this to last. Us
These steps towards fiscal rebalancing are primarily aimed at preserving our social policies. # PT35anos http://t.co/o9Vw14u9RU
We will expand infrastructure concessions: railways, ports, airports and waterways as well. Us
In the coming days we will launch the third stage of #MinhaCasaMinhaVida with 3 million houses. Us
We trust in the strength of our people, we are sure of the social and economic base of our Country.
We must face ignorance and misinformation without respite. It is not because the election ended we should not continue. Us
We have to react to the rumors, to wage the battle of communication. We can not leave doubts. Us
The people voted for us because we believe that we are the ones indicated to do what is necessary for Brazil to advance (...)
(...) pq believes in our ability and honesty of purpose. Us

My commitment is to reach the end of the mandate and say that never before in the history of the country have governments fought with such firmness and corruption.
The healthy commitment of Justice should allow us to recognize that Petrobras is the strategic + company and it contracts and invests in the country.
On Tuesday Petrobras won the highest prize in the oil area of ​​an organization called OTC, an Oscar type of oil. Us
Let's continue to believe in the Brazilian + of the companies, it will only continue to serve the country well if it is ever + Brazilian. Us
I'm sure the Brazilians expect us to behave in a healthy way. Us
We will honor each citizen with exemplary management q executes with celerity and efficiency policies that will keep Brazil on the path of development
Political reform is central, we must put it as a priority. Us
If you make a mistake, those who made the mistake pay for it. But we must preserve the history of this party and our governments. Us
We should be very proud because the PT was the party that most promoted social ascension. Us

After the signing of the important agreement on the Southern Gas Corridor, we become an important partner for Europe.
Shah Deniz reserves more than 1 trillion cubic meters of gas. Together with our other sites (cont) http://t.co/CjoWwxwkCQ
Gas from Azerbaijan is the only new gas source that European consumers will get in the near future.
The Southern Gas Corridor project should be viewed as a project that serves the national security of the countries involved.
A special approach to removing this project from common rules and procedures is sometimes required.
We need coordination and strong support from European organizations so that we do not waste time on bureaucratic procedures.
We can still attract the countries that are not members of the Southern Gas Corridor project, but most of the Nabucco project.
We can move this project far beyond Romania, Hungary and Austria.
We have undertaken to implement the TAPP project, which is the first part, until 2018, by 2020.
